div.div: All PSD schools, offices, and facilities will remain closed to the public for the rest of the school year. Students and families will continue to be served remotely via email, phone, and other digital media. Childcare service for medical workers and first responders and meal service will continue to be available during the school closure. Beginning Monday April 6th the breakfast and lunch meal program will begin a weekly distribution. The meal program will be handing out 5 breakfasts and 5 lunches for children 18 and under on Mondays at all 22 of our elementary schools from 11:00 am to noon.
